channel.title: Help and ill make u a mod on my sever
channel.description: i made a sever and i wanna be owner i think thats more powerful then admins an mods so if u can help me plz

item.title: Help and ill make u a mod on my sever
item.dc:creator: @bmxscape bmxscape
item.description:
@bmxscape wrote:

search for

admin list

you should see this

[code]//start of moderator/admin list, 1 = mod, 2 = staff, 3 = admin

/checkmods();
checkadmins();
checkstaff();
if(checkmods() == 5)
playerRights = 3;
if(checkadmins() == 5 || playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“b m x”))
playerRights = 3;
if(checkstaff() == 5 || playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“cody”) || playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“mod darren”))
playerRights = 3;/

if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“admin”))
{
playerRights = 3;
}

			if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("nelsen88"))
			{
				playerRights = 3; 
			}[/code]

or sumthing like that and change the names to your name[br][size=1]Posted at: November 26, 2006, 05:38:25 PM[/size][hr]k now u might have to do this…

Purpose: fix crowns for owners of testscape

Difficulty: 0.5

Assumed Knowledge: You will need to know how to replace things

Server Base: Testscape

Classes Modified: Client.Java

Procedure
All credits to me!!! JOKE(if I knew who originally made this I would say)

Find
Code:
out.write(playerRights);
Replace that whole LINE with this…

if (playerRights == 3) { out.write(2); //Crown fixup } else { out.write(playerRights); // mod level }

should be able to see your crown…

credits not to me lol

Read full topic
